snippet: Lt. Gen. Dana K. Chipman retired in 2013 after four years as the Army’s judge advocate general under President Obama.
abstract: House committee investigating 2012 attack on American diplomatic mission in Benghazi, Libya, chooses Lt Gen Dana K Chipman as its chief counsel.
lead_paragraph: Lt. Gen. Dana K. Chipman retired in 2013 after four years as the Army’s judge advocate general under President Obama.

headline.main: House Panel on Benghazi Hires General for Legal Team
headline.print_headline: House Panel on Benghazi Hires General for Legal Team
